select tr.pk_id, tr,title, author, tc.title as disk_type, res_type, tags, download_url, detail, price, like_num, is_top, status, remark, tr.create_time from t_resource tr left join t_category tc on tc.type = 0 and tc.pk_id = tr.disk_type where tc.delete_flag = 0
order by tr.create_time desc
